parameters.name: DataRegion
parameters.description: The region where the data lake resides.

parameters.name: DbName
parameters.description: The name of the database that you want to query.

parameters.name: Location
parameters.description: The storage path of the database. Supports the OSS, S3, and S3A protocols.

parameters.name: Parameters
parameters.description: The key-value pairs of the database attributes.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description:
The ID of the tenant.

> To view the ID of the tenant, go to the Data Management (DMS) console and move the pointer over the profile picture in the upper-right corner. For more information, see the [View information about the current tenant](~~181330~~) section of the "Manage DMS tenants" topic.
